divs: Sighting DetailsDriving east on golf course rd, I observed 3 orange glowing lights off to the southeast over the mesa that sits to the south over mountainair, as i stoped to roll my passenger window down a fourth and then fifth light appeared all in a straight line maybe slight arch to it. Then they started to flicker out one at a time in the order they came on...it was a little after dusk and i could clearly see the line between the sky and the mesa,and they were in the sky...each one was easily as big as a house..I must have been 2 or three miles away from them..it reminded me of the phoenix lights...So i continued out to the highway and started in to town and i saw it again in the same spot in the rear view mirror,but just for a second and just one. Then it disapeard..
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mountainair
There were no other sightings in Mountainair on or around December 15th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
